CurrencyPattern.COMMENT: currency pattern; {symbol} is the placehoder for the leading currency symbol; {code} is the placeholder for the trailing currency code e.g. $ 5,000.00 USD, ï¿½ 4,000 GBP. The formate pattern is based on ECMAScript Internationalization API. SYMBOL_DISPLAY is a boolean indicating whether to use the currency symbol or code.
